item.title: Video Recordings of Alumni Sharing Events
item.dc:creator: Albert Au Yeung
item.description: We successfully organized two alumni sharing events on 22nd May and 17th July 2021. The video recordings of the events are now available on Youtube.

item.title: Alumni Sharing Series - Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies
item.dc:creator: Albert Au Yeung
item.description:
The next alumni sharing event is coming! Register Now! IEAA is organising an alumni sharing event on the topic of blockchain and cryptocurrencies. The details of the event is as follows:

Date

17th July, 2021 (Sat)

Time

4:30pm - 6:00pm (Hong Kong Time)

Venue

Online Event
(Zoom meeting link will be shared to participants before the event)

(Zoom meeting link will be shared to participants before the event)
